title: FS Sharp T206 Hal Chase, Pink Background
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: FS Sharp T206 Hal Chase, Pink Background
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this sharp T206 Hal Chase, Pink Portrait, Piedmont 150, for sale.

There are two light surface wrinkles that do not extend through to the back of the card. One extends from the right border to just above the player's head. The second from the left border to the player's collar. Light corner wear. Card measures 1 7/16 X 2 5/8

Price: $300.00 delivered.

Payment: Paypal F/F, money order.

First response that says I will take it gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
